name: Cadastral Download Shapefile
description: Download shapefile from Cadastral Agency of Italy: one-to-one and from CSV

name: Coordinate Shapefile
description: Easily extract coordinates from Shapefiles (points, lines, polygons) into CSV format directly in QGIS

name: USDA Soil Texture Classifier
description: Python tool for QGIS that classifies soil samples into USDA texture classes (e.g., Clay, Sandy Loam, Silty Clay Loam) based on sand, silt, and clay percentages.

name: SoilGrids Global Soil Data
description: SoilGrids provides global soil property maps based on machine learning models, offering predictions for sand, silt, clay content, pH, organic carbon, and more at multiple depths.

name: Transcripter Audio with Whisper üó£Ô∏èüìù
description: This project uses OpenAI's Whisper to transcribe audio files into text in Google Colab
